Text: HowdyHowdy Kimbo Hope all is well I did not receive the job announcement we spoke about I thought maybe the email address I gave you did not get relayed accurately so I thought I would send you a note Maybe you could attach the announcement to this and respond You were so very right in what you said the other night There definitely is a new day each day with the Enrongate Hang in there The callous few will not ruin everything for everyone else It seems bad now but I have faith that something good will come from all of this Thanks for thinking of me with the job Ill let you know what I do Kyle
